title: Frequency of internet use in Spain 2017
summary: This is a bar chart representing Duration in the x axis and Share of individuals in the y axis.
Duration Once a week (including every day) has the highest Share of individuals and Less than once a week has the lowest Share of individuals.
The difference of Share of individuals between the highest and lowest Duration is 75.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Duration in the x axis and Share of individuals in the y axis.
The maximum Share of individuals 80.0 is found at Duration Once a week (including every day) and the minimum is found at Less than once a week where Duration is 5.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Duration in the x axis and Share of individuals in the y axis.
Duration Once a week (including every day) has the highest Share of individuals and Less than once a week has the lowest Share of individuals.
The difference of Share of individuals between the highest and lowest Duration is 75.0.
max_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Duration, and Share of individuals in each Duration on the y axis.
The Share of individuals is appeared to be the highest at Duration Once a week (including every day) and lowest at Duration Less than once a week.
Second maximum Share of individuals is found at Duration .
The highest Duration Once a week (including every day) has 75.0 more Share of individuals than the lowest Duration Less than once a week.

The Duration Once a week (including every day) has the highest Share of individuals, followed by , and At least once a week (but not every day). Down to the Duration Less than once a week which is the lowest.
The highest value 80.0 at Once a week (including every day) is almost 1.94 times larger than the average value 41.25.
The Share of individuals is 165.0 if we add up values of all Durations.

data.Duration: At least once a week (but not every day)
